text: José Rafael Peralta (November 10, 1971 – November 22, 2018) was an American politician. He was born in New York City. He was in the New York State Assembly and New York State Senate. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He last represented District 13 in the State Senate. He was elected in a landslide to the New York State Senate on March 16, 2010. Peralta died at the age of 47 on November 22, 2018 of a heart attack in New York City. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jose Peralta
